import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-post-announcement', templateUrl: './post-announcement.component.html', styleUrls: ['./post-announcement.component.scss'] }) export class PostAnnouncementComponent { }
Post Announcement
“There is no exercise better for the heart than reaching down and lifting people up.”

Kindly, we inform you that you must enter your contact details and describe your post.

Please enter your last name in the label.
Please enter your first name in the label.
Please enter a product name in the label.
invalid prescreption file
Please enter a product description in the textarea.
$ € DT
Please enter your contact.
